r.s: Creole parser and renderer for Text_Wiki
r.d: Parses Creole mark-up to tokenize the text for Text_Wiki rendering and also renders for wiki conversion. You can see a reference for this syntax here: http://www.wikicreole.org/
r.n: Text_Wiki_Creole is now compliant with version 0.5 of Creole specs. See http://www.wikicreole.org/wiki/Creole0.5
